references.paper_title: List-decodable robust mean estimation and learning mixtures of spherical Gaussians
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of list-decodable mean estimation, which is central to the proposed algorithm and theoretical analysis in the current work.

references.paper_title: Robustly learning mixtures of k arbitrary Gaussians
references.reason: This paper provides state-of-the-art results on robust mixture learning, which serves as a benchmark and inspiration for the list-decodable mixture learning problem in the current work.
This book provides a comprehensive overview of algorithmic high-dimensional robust statistics, which is foundational for the development of robust mean estimation and mixture learning algorithms.

references.paper_title: Clustering mixture models in almost-linear time via list-decodable mean estimation
references.reason: This paper introduces an efficient algorithm for clustering mixture models using list-decodable mean estimation, which directly inspires the inner stage of the algorithm presented in this work.

references.paper_title: Robust moment estimation and improved clustering via sum of squares
references.reason: This paper develops robust moment estimation techniques using sum-of-squares, which are leveraged in the current work to handle outliers and achieve strong error guarantees.
